header: Be Who You Want, Talk To Whom You Need.
join input message: Don't worry. We hate spam, and will not share your email with anyone.
featurette content: RoleSwitch creates contact between people who need to talk and others who are ready to listen and act as you need.
featurette one title: Get the role of your choice
featurette one content: Ever dreamed of becoming a CEO of a company? A president? Or maybe simply a father? Now is your chance to switch your role, and take the life of someone for a limited time.
featurette two content: You were on your way home when a cop just stopped you for no reason and got you to pay a penalty? You have two words to say to that cop! But you can't say it directly to him.. No worries, just free your heart on a cop role and tell him what you feel about him.
featurette three content: Get requests from other people that have things to say to you. Try giving them the answer they want to gain points and get at your turn the answers you're seeking.
featurette footer: Life has never been easier, people have never got closer.
